channel.title: How do i make Objects Talk?
channel.description: i saw a tutorial on this once but lost it... id really like to know how to make objects talk.. cus.. when there npcs... people keep killing them lol... my sever base is pimpscape

item.title: How do i make Objects Talk?
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

This is why I hate moparscape. You can get repped for the most useless, most insignificant piece of help.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make Objects Talk?

item.title: How do i make Objects Talk?
item.dc:creator: @the_rel_pure the rel pure
item.description:
@the_rel_pure wrote:

Sick of Air:

Basically the tutorial told you to put a talking NPC in the same coords as the object. The object will cover up the NPC, thus making the object look like it’s talking.

oh ok lol sexxyyxx ++reped

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make Objects Talk?

item.title: How do i make Objects Talk?
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

Basically the tutorial told you to put a talking NPC in the same coords as the object. The object will cover up the NPC, thus making the object look like it’s talking.
